:ENV
export BOXES_TEST_XXD=1
:ARGS
-f 161_eol_control_list_designs_crlf.cfg -l -e CRlf
:INPUT
:OUTPUT-FILTER
s/^.*([0-9a-fA-F]{4}):/0000\1:/
:EXPECTED
00000000: 3420 4176 6169 6c61 626c 6520 5374 796c  4 Available Styl
